formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( \text{Magic Number} = (\text{Total Games} - (\text{Games Won} + \text{Tied Games})) + 1 \) Where Total Games is the number of games in the season, Games Won is the number of games your team has won, and Tied Games is the number of games that ended in a tie.

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
